overview: Mr. Jessup joined the management group of SHCP in 2005. He is responsible for originating, underwriting, structuring, monitoring, and exiting portfolio company investments. Prior to joining SHCP, Mr. Jessup was a principal in Blue Ridge Investors II, L.P. (and affiliated entities), an SBIC located in Greensboro, NC. Prior to joining Blue Ridge Investors II, L.P. in 1998 Jessup was employed by Wachovia Bank, and prior to that, Central Carolina Bank. During Jessupâ€™s banking career he was a Commercial Lending Officer and held various Loan Administration positions. E-mail: kjessup@salemcapital.com
